title: The Shade
desc:
Post 2364
- **Hidden**
- In 3-5 turns, you are pretended to be **Destroyed,** but you live and are still in the game. Cards you play are not shown, you are shown to be out of the game, ect.
- Your place in the turn order also changes when you are pretended to be **Destroyed.**
- You cannot be targeted by any effects while foux dead, except for ones that remove your ID.
